group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:  "I wanna be able to go out in front]@[textBlack:  of everyone with my chin up,]@[textBlack:  compete in inline skating]@[textBlack:  tournaments with pride,]@[textBlack:  and handle everyday life by]@[textBlack:  myself without difficulty."]

[textBlack:  "I feel like becoming someone]@[textBlack:  independent like that is a]@[textBlack:  requirement for staying]@[textBlack:  together with Lady San,]@[textBlack:  even when we're adults,@  you know...?"]

[textBlack:  "However, I don't want people to]@[textBlack:  think I'm fooling around. I'll go]@[textBlack:  to college to learn some useful]@[textBlack:  skills for revitalizing the town,]@[textBlack:  and then I'll go on to work for]@[textBlack:  the local government."]
[textBlack:  "Through organizing various]@[textBlack:  local events, I will elevate]@[textBlack:  Hikarizuka to national fame."]
[textBlack:  "Yeah, I just want people to say@  'Wow, you're doing a great job,@  thank you.'"]
[textBlack:  "And also, I prefer being alone over@  being surrounded by people, so I'd@  like it if people wouldn't make fun@  of me just for keeping to myself@  in the classroom..."]
[textBlack:  "I'm still a bit undecided,@  but to be honest,@  I'd like to be a fashion designer,@  or a stylist."]
[textBlack:  "If Magical Girl Supremacy@  works out, and people stop@  teasing me, and I can be more@  open with people, then it should@  become easier to me to talk@  assertively with people."]
[textBlack:  "Besides, this is still Part One of]@[textBlack:  the future I want, y'know?!"]
[textBlack:  "Do we still have time?!]@[textBlack:  There's a TON of stuff I]@[textBlack:  wanna talk about!"]

[textBlack:  "I got things to say about Shigurin,]@[textBlack:  Hagurin, the Instructor, Miyurin,]@[textBlack:  Miwarin, and all the Feathers.]@[textBlack:  I'm tellin' ya, I could legit go on]@[textBlack:  for ages!"]
